itemText: The following questions ask you about what you think other people are like and what you think about how they act.
I feel disrespected when people don’t include me in the group.
It is important that people show that they respect you.
I feel disrespected when a group is making a decision and I don’t get to say what I think.
People want to make you feel like they are better than you.
I feel disrespected when people tease me.
It is important to let people know that they should respect you.
I feel disrespected when people don’t listen to what I have to say.
If you are not careful, people will make you feel like you are no good.
I feel disrespected when I am treated unfairly.
I feel disrespected when someone gossips about me.
People are always trying to make themselves look like they are better than you.
It is more important to be respected than liked.
